analysis.description:
SponsoredItemGooRaffle.buyRaffleTicket (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#61-89) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-goo.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,ticketsCost) (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#66)
	-goo.transfer(address(0),(ticketsCost * 95) / 100) (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#69-70)

SponsoredItemGooRaffle.transferGoo (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#146-151) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-goo.transfer(recipient,amount) (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#150)

SponsoredItemGooRaffle.startTokenRaffle (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#40-60) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < endTime) (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#43-44)

SponsoredItemGooRaffle.buyRaffleTicket (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#61-89) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(raffleEndTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#62-64)

SponsoredItemGooRaffle.awardRafflePrize (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#90-132) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- raffleTicketThatWon >= checkTicket.startId && raffleTicketThatWon <= checkTicket.endId (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#103-109)
	- raffleTicketThatWon >= playerTicket.startId && raffleTicketThatWon <= playerTicket.endId (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#120-129)
	- require(bool)(raffleEndTime < block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#93)
	- raffleTicketThatWon >= playersTickets.ticketsBought[0].startId && raffleTicketThatWon <= playersTickets.ticketsBought[endIndex].endId (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#116-132)

SponsoredItemGooRaffle.drawRandomWinner (/unique_chucks/9/0xfc8bdbbf0b121387f914194f53fb3c278ffea9a5.sol#136-144) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
